Count Magician:
Cast your eyes upon the results of this magicial research conducted by Mystics Guild.
You can make use of a magical field capable of teleporting a clan member though a crown, as well as magic that provides special abilities to your low-ranking soldiers. We even have a Talisman, a magical crystal filled with power.
We have also purchased certain items directly from the Elves' mystical merchant. How may I serve you?
Move though the magic field.
Purchase Elven items.
Purchase Bracelet.
Purchase Shirt.
Trade Shirt for Enchanted Shirt.
Obtain Talisman.
Learn special skills for low-ranked soldiers.
